sailpoint.object

Interface Entitlements

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Certifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntitlementGroup, EntitlementSnapshot

    public interface Entitlements
extends Certifiable
    This is an interface for an object that maintains a group of entitlements on an application.

      • getAttributeNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributeNames()
        Cannot seem to get the list of map Attribute map keys from JSF by using "item.attributes.keys" where "item" is an EntitlementGroup and Attribute.getKeys is defined to convert the keySet into a List. The thought is that as soon as it notices that Attributes is a Map, you cannot call getter methods. So something will be provided here.
